topics.title: Overview
topics.content:
## Standup

AI-generated daily standup summaries from your recent git activity across all open projects. Quickly see what you accomplished yesterday, what's planned for today, and any blockers.

topics.title: Key Features
topics.content:
## Key Features

**Generate Standup** — Click the Standup icon in the sidebar rail, then click **Generate**. An AI agent analyzes recent commits across all open projects and produces a summary formatted as Yesterday / Today / Blockers.

**History** — Past standups are stored globally (up to 30 entries) so you can review previous summaries by date.

**Multi-Project** — The standup covers all open projects, grouping accomplishments by project name.

topics.title: Commands
topics.content:
## Commands

Available from the command palette:

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| **Generate Standup** | Creates a fresh standup summary from recent git activity |

topics.title: Permissions
topics.content:
## Permissions

| Permission | Why it's needed |
|------------|----------------|
| **logging** | Log diagnostic information for troubleshooting |
| **storage** | Persist standup history globally |
| **notifications** | Show alerts when generation completes |
| **agents** | Spawn a quick agent to generate the standup |
| **projects** | List all open projects to gather activity |
| **git** | Read recent commit history from each project |
| **commands** | Register the Generate Standup command |
| **theme** | Adapt colors and styles to the current theme |
